description: Get top-10 NBA league leaders for a statistical category

per_mode.description: Statistical aggregation mode. 'Totals'=Season totals, 'PerGame'=Per-game averages, 'Per48'=Per-48-minutes rate
per_mode.title: Per Mode

season.description: Season(s) in 'YYYY-YY' format, or list of seasons. None defaults to current season.
season.title: Season

stat_category.description: Statistical category to rank by. PTS=Points, REB=Rebounds, AST=Assists, STL=Steals, BLK=Blocks, FG_PCT=Field Goal %, FG3_PCT=3-Point %, FT_PCT=Free Throw %
stat_category.title: Stat Category

title: get_league_leaders_info
x-returns: Ranked list of top players for the specified stat
